pageDescription: Latest news and updates about Count Master 3D Game - Stay informed about new features and events!
title: Battle Updates & Crowd News

news.title: New Obstacle Course Update
news.excerpt: We've added 10 new challenging obstacle courses to test your crowd control skills! Navigate through spinning blades, hammers, and new enemy types in this exciting update.

news.title: Special Event: Mega Multiplication
news.excerpt: For a limited time, all multiplication gates will have double their normal effect! Join the Mega Multiplication event and build massive crowds like never before.

news.title: New Character Skins Released
news.excerpt: Customize your crowd with 5 new character skins! Choose from Ninja, Robot, Zombie, Superhero, and Alien themes to make your crowd stand out on the battlefield.

news.title: Count Master Tournament Announced
news.excerpt: Compete against players worldwide in our first official Count Master Tournament! The player with the largest crowd at the finish line wins exclusive rewards.

news.title: New Boss Battle Feature
news.excerpt: Face off against massive boss enemies at the end of each world! These challenging encounters will require strategy and a large crowd to overcome.

news.title: Mobile Version Now Available
news.excerpt: Count Master 3D is now available on iOS and Android devices! Take the crowd running action with you wherever you go and play on the move.
